#Art_de_la_sculpture_sur_noyau_de_Suzhou L'artisan a transformé de minuscules noyaux d'olive en animaux, en coquillages, en statues de Bouddha ou en bijoux grâce à ses compétences de sculpture habiles et délicates. 
#culturechinoise #histoire

#Broderie_de_Suzhou Chaque fil et chaque ligne entre les doigts des artistes chinois se transforment en des tableaux stupéfiants ! 
#culturechinoise #histoire #Jiangsu #Voyage

Je suis actuellement à #Suzhou pour le cinquième Forum culturel Franco-Chinois ! Des artistes, des chercheurs, des entrepreneurs, des diplomates, et bien d'autres personnalités éminentes chinoises et françaises étaient présentes.

La couleur générale du Musée de la #Soie de #Suzhou est principalement blanche, qui est la vraie couleur de la soie. La décoration intérieure du musée est également extrêmement fraîche et élégante. Venez avec moi pour les découvrir ! #Culture #China

Le travail de la #soie est caractéristique de l'une des anciennes civilisations chinoises. #Suzhou est l'une des villes natales de la soie. Il existe des ruines du Nouvel Âge et du Paléolithique dans le bassin du lac Taihu, qui témoignent de la longue histoire de la soie.

Vous connaissez le lac de l'Ouest à Hangzhou, mais connaissez-vous le lac Jinji à #Suzhou ? Info : le lac Jinji est plus grand que le lac de l'Ouest ! C'est un bon endroit pour admirer le coucher du soleil. #voyage #China

Lors de la représentation d'instruments de musique au Forum culturel sino-français tenu à #Suzhou, des gens de tous horizons venus de Chine et de France ont apprécié ces notes avec des milliers d'années d'histoire. La #musique et l'#art sont indépendants du pays et de la langue.

Pour la première fois, l'alimentation électrique de la #CIIE de cette année utilise une #énergie 100 % verte. Devinez d’où vient cette #électricité « verte » ? De la province de l'#Anhui, qui est très proche de Shanghai !

C'est au-delà de mon imagination que le #bambou puisse être utilisé pour fabriquer autant de choses ! Le bambou est très susceptible de remplacer le #plastique à l'avenir et d'apparaître dans tous les aspects de notre vie. Ce sera une énorme contribution au développement durable.

La température s'est enfin refroidie à #Beijing, quelle est la température là-bas ? Le soleil vient de se coucher ici, j'aimerais partager avec vous les moments beaux que j'ai capturés aujourd'hui. #daily #photograph #NatureBeauty

Une autre année s'est écoulée, et je suis toujours entourée d'amour. 
Tellement chanceuse d'avoir vos amitiés...
Aujourd'hui, c'est la #Journée_internationale_des_gibbons. Les #gibbons, une espèce étroitement apparentée à l’homme, sont également une espèce présentant un risque d’extinction très élevé.

Fourrure gris-blanc, queue épaisse et longue, corps doux joliment tacheté. Ce gros félin vivant dans les régions froides des plateaux est le #léopard_des_neiges, surnommé le « roi des montagnes enneigées ».
#EcoChina #nature #Environment

Au moment où j'ai atteint le sommet de la montagne, j'ai ressenti la plus profonde sérénité intérieure. C'est le lac Shengmu Tianchi au sommet des montagnes du nord du Qinghai, un endroit sacré et pur dans le cœur des habitants locaux.  #EcoChina #nature #environment

Les habitants locaux m'ont dit qu'elle s'appelait "Chute d'eau de Hule," le mot "Hule" signifiant les ailes déployées d'un aigle en tibétain. Quelle description à la fois belle et appropriée !  #EcoChina #nature #environment

Ce ne sont pas les Alpes, mais la forêt de montagne de Beishan dans la province du Qinghai, en Chine. Les chercheurs peuvent y mener des expéditions scientifiques, et les gens peuvent y venir pour l'aventure. Quel magnifique cadeau de la nature ! #EcoChina #nature #environment
Êtes-vous constamment inquiets de la chaleur inhabituelle et des inondations qui font l'actualité ? Dans votre imagination, ressemble-t-elle encore à un saphir ou plutôt à une terre sans vie ?

Les #animaux, comme les humains, sont des habitants de la Terre, et certains sont même apparus avant les humains. Dans mon rêve, ils n’avaient plus peur, ils se rapprochaient de mon appareil photo et me laissaient les toucher.
#nature #art #midjourney #environment #photography

Je fais souvent ce rêve : dans le rêve, il y a de magnifiques lumières, accompagnées d'animaux sauvages que je vois rarement dans la vie réelle, et je cours dans les montagnes et les champs verdoyants... 
#nature #art #midjourney #environment

L'#environnement dans les montagnes s'améliore de plus en plus, avec des installations complètes pour le camping en été, la randonnée en automne et le ski en hiver... attirant de plus en plus de jeunes qui sortent de chez eux et ressentent le charme de la nature.  #Beijing #China

Une soirée parfaite au bord de la rivière Chao Phraya...
Le paysage ici est magnifique, vous pouvez profiter du paysage le plus prospère de Bangkok le long de la rivière. #MemoriesEnRoute #TheNewSilkRoad #LaCeintureEtLaRoute #voyage #culture

Le Wat Arun est un magnifique temple bouddhiste situé sur les bords du fleuve Chao Phraya. C'est l'un des monuments les plus visités de Bangkok. #MemoriesEnRoute #TheNewSilkRoad #LaCeintureEtLaRoute #voyage #culture

Si la #Thaïlande est célèbre pour son beau paysage et son ambiance accueillante, le pays est aussi une référence en matière de « #gastronomie », en particulier de ses collations. Les collations thaïlandaises sont abordables. #MemoriesEnRoute #TheNewSilkRoad #LaCeintureEtLaRoute

L'ancienne ville culturelle de #Kandy, au centre de Sri Lanka, cache un lac dont l'histoire est aussi enivrante que sa « beauté ». Explorez la beauté du lac Kandy avec moi !
#MemoriesEnRoute #TheNewSilkRoad #LaCeintureEtLaRoute #voyage #culture

In the coming decades, both China's economic growth model, industrial structure upgrade, energy structure adjustment, as well as individual consumption patterns, and lifestyles, will all undergo a reshaping under the guidance of "zero-carbon".
Lenovo also sets phased goals every year, by 2022, Lenovo has accelerated its zero-carbon transformation, with the establishment of a net-zero target by 2023.
By 2025, Lenovo aims to achieve a carbon reduction of over a million tons throughout the entire value chain and supply chain system. The ultimate goal is to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050.

Throughout the construction process of Lenovo Group Innovation Industrial Park (Tianjin), innovative green and zero-carbon measures have been carried out in planning, layout, construction, design, materials, ventilation, power supply, heating and cooling, and pollution control.
On November 6, Lenovo Group Innovation Industrial Park (Tianjin) was officially completed in Tianjin Binhai New Area.

This advanced zero-carbon factory has implemented a total of 90 carbon reduction measures in nine major areas, including green energy, architectural design, smart manufacturing, park management, and digital collaboration.

Xiaolianzhuang Village in Nanxun Ancient Town is a classical garden complex built during the Guangxu period of the Qing Dynasty. When autumn comes, the garden is poetic in all its golden colours. #FunInCountryside

In autumn, the vast fields of golden rice in Dongziguan Village, Fuyang District, Hangzhou City are linked together in a row. It is like an oil painting, with white-walled, green-tiled houses and distant mountains in the background. #AmazingZhejiang
Tea is deeply integrated into the life of Zhejiang people, and tea elements can be found everywhere in Zhejiang. Which tea-related product would you most like to try? #TeaTime

Yuhang Umbrella Making Expertise 
Date: 09 May 2022 - 31 May 2027
Venue: Hangzhou Cultural Center
This exhibition is about the art of making Yuhang paper umbrellas and its history. #InfoTour

Xinrongji Home Roasted Bamboo Shoots is a specialty from Taizhou, Zhejiang Province. The soup is milky white in color, and the fresh flavors of the meat and bamboo shoots go well together, making the dish succulent and delicious. #YummyZhejiang

Yangjiatang Village in Lishui is known as "the last secret place in China's Jiangnan area". Surrounded by beautiful scenery, the village is built in the mountains in a staggered manner and is preserved in a complete style of ancient Chinese villages. #FunInCountryside

Baiyunshan Park is located in Taizhou City, Zhejiang Province. During the day, the Baiyun Pavilion looks solemn and elegant with white walls and red cornices, and at night it shines with colorful lightings. #AmazingZhejiang

By the stream with its clear water and the tea leaves with their fragrance, the tea pickers sing softly in a chorus while picking tea, with a beautiful and gentle melody and joyful and pleasant words. #SplendidZhejiang

In Didanghu Park in Shaoxing City, Zhejiang Province, there is a beautiful pavilion sitting quietly by the lake. The gentle breeze ripples the water surface, as if telling the story of the pavilion and the lake. #AmazingZhejiang

Leifeng Pagoda in Sunset is one of the Ten Scenic Spots in West Lake. Leifeng Pagoda and the mountain in the sunset form an absolutely beautiful scene. It is so beautiful that the afterglow falls on the surface of the lake as the sun sets in the west. #AmazingZhejiang

There is a spectacular persimmon grove in Meili Village, Xiaoshan District, Hangzhou City. At this time of the year, many orange persimmons hang like lanterns on the branches of more than 1,500 persimmon trees, adding a splash of color to the whole village. #FunInCountryside

Xuedousi Temple is located in the centre of Xuedoushan Mountain in Zhejiang, one of the 5 most famous Buddhist mountains in China. Surrounded by numerous peaks with scenery, it is the most famous place of worship and practice of Maitreya Buddha in China. #AmazingZhejiang

This exquisite wood carved incense container is patterned after the Yiwu Huangshan Bamianting Hall. The smoke drift out slowly through the tiny holes when incense is burned inside. As the smoke swirls around, a piece of auspiciousness is present. #PopProZhejiang

Jiuxi Misty Forest is one of the new top ten scenic spots in West Lake. Walking along the undulating paths and enjoying the charming autumn colours is like being in a floating fairytale forest. Do you like autumn trips like this?  #AmazingZhejiang

Lost in Paradise: Crafts of Suzhou and Hangzhou
Open Dates: 25 August - 26 November 2023
Venue: Hangzhou Arts and Crafts Museum
Nearly 200 pieces/sets of excellent cultural relics and contemporary handicrafts are displayed. #InfoTour

Dongpu Ancient Town is the birthplace of Shaoxing Rice Wine. In the town, the sparkling rivers, harbors, houses with old tiles and walls, the brewing equipment such as wine tanks and jars form a picture of life in the small town Shaoxing Rice Wine. #FunInCountryside

Originating from the everyday life of the Wenzhou people in Zhejiang, the folk song "Sing with the Birds" is a classic folk song. It is very popular in Wenzhou, which is a fertile land with beautiful scenery and a profound culture of natural landscape.

Ningbo's specialty, Potato Flat Cake, is made from fresh potato. Steamed, flattened, deep-fried in hot oil until golden brown and sprinkled with your favourite seasoning, it's ready to be served with a cake of crisp outer skin and soft inner flesh. Try it! #YummyZhejiang

Longmen Ancient Town, located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, is the hometown of Sun Quan, the founder of the Wu State of the Three Kingdoms period in China. It is a typical rustic ancient town that perfectly embodies the traditional Chinese inheritance system.#AmazingZhejiang

The North Lake of Qingshanhu National Forest Park in Lin'an, Hangzhou, has large groves of metasequoia trees. In autumn, the red sequoia forest always attracts a lot  of tourists. Would you like to float through the tall sequoias in a kayak on the green lake?  #FunInCountryside

The Southern Clan Confucius Family Temple in Quzhou, Zhejiang, is one of the 3 remaining Confucius Family Temples in China. The stream inside the temple flows gently between the pavilions and buildings, giving the whole temple a sense of vitality and strength. #AmazingZhejiang

With a long history of tea plantation, tea has been integrated into the life of Zhejiang people. Which kind of tea do you find most interesting? A. Tea for welcoming guests B. Tea for the wedding C. Medical tea against colds #TeaTime

Ao assumir a presidência do Conselho de Segurança da ONU, a China preparou para o Conselho um presente, o Lu Ban Lock, um tradicional brinquedo de quebra-cabeça intelectual chinês inventado há 2.500 anos.

Assim como a paz, o Lu Ban Lock é fácil de desmontar, mas difícil de montar. É fácil de destruir, mas difícil de reconstruir. Para resolver eficazmente o quebra-cabeça, precisamos utilizar a abordagem certa ao observar e analisar cuidadosamente, mantendo a paciência e confiança.

A China espera que os membros do Conselho de Segurança e os países membros possam se unir de forma coesa como as várias peças do Lu Ban Lock, trabalhando juntos para alcançar resultados positivos no trabalho do Conselho de Segurança.

百年前の孫文先生の姿と表情を忠実に再現し、「大志を胸に抱く」という気品が感じさせた作品だ。中日平和友好条約締結４５周年に際して、孫文先生が１１０年前訪れた旧安川邸に末永く屹立するこの銅像は、中日友好の新たなモニュメントになるだろう。
「孫文先生像」の除幕式に参加。１９１３年、孫文先生が安川敬一郎宅を訪れた時、書かれた「世界平和」の書は中日友好交流の証となっている。この度、国際的著名な彫刻家であり、中国美術館館長の呉為山先生がこの銅像を制作し、北九州市に寄贈したのです。

The symposium kicked off in Ningbo on Nov 16, attracting around 300 scholars and managers from 27 engineering educational institutes and 127 colleges around the world.

In a spectacular display of cultural vibrancy, 400 lion dance and dragon dance performers in Ninghai County, #Ningbo, dazzled the audience with a mesmerizing show on Nov 15. A celebration of tradition and unity! #NingboArt

#Ningbo in East China’s Zhejiang province established friendly exchange relations with #Djibouti, capital of the Republic of Djibouti, on Nov 15, fostering stronger ties between the two regions.  #NingboFocus
Ningbo Charity Federation received a letter with a stack of remittance receipts from a “familiar” anonymous donor on Nov 15.  #NingboStory

Over the past 25 years, the donor has donated every winter to the federation by the “shun qi zi ran” alias, which means “let things take their course.” This year, the donor donated 1.08 million yuan ($148,902), reaching a cumulative total of 15.77 million yuan.
Embracing the enchanting hues of early winter! Nestled amidst a forest ablaze in red and yellow, #Ningbo's Wenchang Pavilion in Xikou town has donned a new charm. #WinterinNingbo

Since Jan 1, #Ningbo has extended long-term care insurance coverage to all residents with disabilities. With 340 specialized care institutions and 6,000+ skilled caregivers, the city has provided services to 24,262 individuals by the end of October. #NingboFocus
Impressive trade stats from #Ningbo in the first 10 months of 2023! #NingboFocus

The city’s total imports and exports reached a whopping 1.99 trillion yuan ($274 billion), with exports contributing 1.46 trillion yuan and imports 538.9 billion yuan. Noteworthy is the significant role of private enterprises, constituting 43.5 percent of total imports.

Eighty-one families embarked on a harvest journey at a farming event at Xilin Academy in #Ningbo on Nov 11. The event was part of the month-long Futian Music Festival launched by the city’s Yinzhou district to vitalize rural areas. #FuninNingbo

‍For three consecutive years, a group of running lovers in #Ningbo donated winter clothing to children in Liangshan Yi autonomous prefecture, Sichuan province. Running for a cause, warming hearts in the chilly season! #NingboStory

Two agricultural products from #Ningbo -Yuyao’s zhacai (pickled mustard stem) and Xiangshan’s Red Beauty (a variety of citrus), were recently listed among China’s best practices of agro-products with geographical indications to help promote rural vitalization. #NingboFocus
Zhacai is a pillar industry in Yuyao and has created 100,000 jobs in the region. The annual output of industries related to zhacai reaches 5 billion yuan ($685 million).

Renowned for its sweetness and aroma, Red Beauty is hailed as the "Hermès of citrus." With the annual production valued at 800 million yuan, the fruit makes up 67 percent of Xiangshan’s total citrus production.

From Nov 11 to 12, nearly 20,000 visitors were immersed in the magic of animation at the 2023 #Ningbo City Animation Festival. With vibrant events and nearly 100+ animation companies, it was a weekend of endless fun! ##FuninNingbo

Applause for #Ningbo's counties! In the latest rankings of China’s top 100 counties and county-level cities in terms of investment competitiveness, Cixi ranks 4th while Yuyao, Xiangshan, and Ninghai secure the 14th, 39th, and 45th spots respectively.  #NingboFocus
Exciting News! #Amazon China Global Store unveiled its first in-land bonded warehouse in #Ningbo on Nov 10. Ready to elevate your #BlackFriday shopping experience with swift deliveries!  #NingboFocus

Early winter at #Ningbo’s Dongqian Lake is pure magic!  Tranquil waters mirror the changing hues of the autumn leaves, while the crisp air and serene atmosphere make it a perfect escape.  #WinterinNingbo

Chen Zhizhong is a self-taught painter in #Ningbo. Without formal training, he has developed his own unique painting style for over the course of 50 years. Chen is currently busy preparing for his solo exhibition, which will be held in Zhanqi town next spring. #NingboStory

The first round of the annual online shopping festival, which ran from Oct 31 to Nov 2, kept cross-border e-commerce buzzing at #Ningbo’s Qianwan Comprehensive Bonded Zone, which has handled 1.04 million orders. [/Zhuo Songlei] #NingboFocus

Come explore the Hemudu culture with an exhibition at the National Museum of China in #Beijing! Witness the cultural evolution through 324 artifacts, including pottery, stone, and wooden tools, from #Ningbo’s Hemudu, Tianluoshan, Tashan, and Jingtoushan sites. #NingboArt

Two international e-commerce  standards related to the vocabulary, principles and framework of transaction assurance were released in Hangzhou, #Zhejiang on Nov 14. Spearheaded by #China, both of them fill gaps in the global e-commerce sector. [/VCG]

The 5th Overseas Chinese Imported Commodities Expo wrapped up in #Zhejiang's Lishui with triumph success, as tentative deals worth a record high of more than 3.26 billion yuan ($449.7 million)  were signed during the event. [/VCG]

The rural tradition of shaiqiu, or drying crops  in #autumn, has recently drawn scores of visitors to the ancient Linkeng village in Wenzhou, #Zhejiang province, to relish the pure joy of harvest time in this picturesque setting. [/VCG]

The 2nd Global Digital Trade Expo will take place in #Hangzhou from Nov 23 to 27, with a series of forums on digitally empowered green development, international governance of the digital economy IP, and the rule of law regarding digital trade slated. [File photo/VCG]

The annual list of the top 100 #Zhejiang private enterprises was released on Nov 14, with a threshold of 20.27 billion yuan ($2.8 billion) in operating revenue set this time. Rongsheng, Geely and Hengyi Petrochemical made the cut as the top three . [/VCG] #ZhejiangBiz
Even the chilly winds  can't diminish the serene beauty of the West Lake in #Hangzhou. Admire the timeless charm of this scenic spot, which looks ravishing in every season! [/VCG]

Excitement filled the air in Kuzhutang village of Yiwu, #Zhejiang from Nov 11 to 13, as a thrilling bullfighting  competition took center stage. Thousands of spectators were captivated by this example of local intangible cultural heritage. [/VCG] 
@CharmingYiwu

The 2023 Beijing-Hangzhou Dialogue  opened on Nov 13, bringing together diverse voices to explore how the cities and residents along the #GrandCanal can better utilize canal resources, promote canal conservation and carry forward canal culture. 
@VisitBeijingcn

The 2023 China International Huangjiu Industry Expo & 29th #Shaoxing Huangjiu Festival were held in Shaoxing from Nov 8 to 12, tapping into the rich culture of this popular Chinese alcoholic beverage. A toast  to heritage and innovation in every sip! [/VCG]

Closing the curtains on another successful chapter, the World Internet Conference #Wuzhen Summit wrapped up in #Zhejiang province on Nov 10, with over 1,800 guests from 126 countries and regions having participated. See you next year ! [/VCG] #WIC

The Conference on Industrial Cooperation in the Digital Economy took place during the World Internet Conference #Wuzhen Summit on Nov 9, with 24 agreements worth in excess of 100 billion yuan ($13.71 billion) signed, marking a new record . [/VCG] #WIC

The 9th Chinese #Tea Wonderful Game held in #Hangzhou's Xihu district from Nov 9 to 11 is a feast for all the senses. Beyond the various kinds of teas , the spotlight is also on visually stunning and delectable tea refreshments . [/VCG] #WhatsOnZhejiang

What exactly is a digital economy? How will the development of digital technology change our lives? What kind of future world will the ever-expanding digital industry create for us? Let's take a look with our host Evy Pinero to find out! #WIC

The World Internet Science and Technology Museum, the world's first large-scale sci-tech museum dedicated to the #internet, has opened in #Zhejiang's Wuzhen. With a vast 7,000-sq-m exhibition area, it offers a journey  through the past and future of the internet. [/VCG] #WIC

. "她们" refers to a group of females. For this refer List of radicals 214.
When referring to a group, "他们" refers to a group of all males or a mixed group.
Additionally, there is a polite second person form "您",
Those are all singular though. To make them plural, all you need to do is add the suffix "-们" to it.

နွေဦးရာသီတွင် စပါးစိုက်ခင်းများမှ နွေစပါးပျိုးပင်များမှ ဆောင်းဦးစပါးမှည့်ရွှေဝါအထိ ဓာတ်ပုံဆရာသည် ယူနန်ပြည်နယ် ကျောင်းတုန်းမြို့ချောင်ကျားကောင်တီရှိ စပါးခင်းများ၏ လှပသော ပုံများကို မှတ်တမ်းတင်ခဲ့သည်။  စပါးပင်များသည် တရွေ့ရွေ့နဲ့ တဟုန်ထိုး တက်ကြွ‌နေကြပါသည်။  
#yunnan

မကြာသေးမီက ယူနန်ပြည်နယ်၊ ကျင်းဟုန်မှ လူငယ်တစ်ဦးဖြစ်သော ယန်ဝမ် သည် လမ်းပေါ်တွင် 3D သုံးဖက်မြင် ပန်းချီကားများကို ဖန်တီးခဲ့ပြီးလမ်းမျက်နှာပြင်ကို ကွက်ကွက်ကွင်းကွင်းနှင့် စိတ်ဝင်စားဖွယ်ဖြစ်အောင် ဖန်တီးကာ သက်ရှိထင်ရှားရှိသော ပန်းချီကားများသဖွယ် ခရီးသွားများကို ဆွဲဆောင်ခဲ့သည်။

နိုဝင်ဘာလ ၁၃ ရက်နေ့ ညနေ ၅:၃၀ နာရီခန့်တွင် ကြီးမားသော "ရောင်စုံတိမ်တိုက်" သည်  ယူနန်ပြည်နယ်ပူးအာမြို့   နင်းအာကောင်တီရှိ ကျုရှန်းမူလတန်းကျောင်းတွင် ပေါ်လာသည်။  ဖြစ်စဉ်တစ်ခုလုံးသည် ၁၀ မိနစ်ခန့်ကြာမြင့်ပြီးရောင်စုံတိမ်များဟု ခေါ်ကြသော  “ခုနစ်ရောင်တိမ်” ဖြစ်သည်။

ရှန်းဂဲရီလာသူခဲ့ကျုံးရှေးဟောင်းမြို့ကိုစူးစမ်းလေ့လာရာတွင်၎င်းမ
သည်မြောက်ဘက်ရှေးဟောင်းပိုးလမ်းမပေါ်ရှိ အဓိကမြို့တစ်မြို့ဖြစ်သည်။အဖြူ‌ရောင်နံရံရှိလူနေအိမ်များကြားလျှောက်သွားကာ ကမ္ဘာ့အကြီးဆုံးကောင်း‌သောအတိတ်နိမိတ်‌ဆောင်သောအဆောက်အအုံကိုလှည့်ပတ်ပြီး ယူနန်ပြည်တွင်ကြည့်ရှုခံစားလိုက်ပါ။

ရှန်းဂဲရီလာရှိရှီချွန်းတံတားသည် ကျင်းရှားမြစ်ကို ဖြတ်ကာ မြစ်ရေသည် အံ့သြဖွယ်ကောင်းစွာစီးဆင်း‌နေပါသည်။  မြစ်ကမ်းတစ်လျှောက်ရှိ ရွာများ၊ လယ်ကွင်းများ၊ အိမ်များ နေရာတိုင်းတွင်ရိုးရှင်းသောလေထုကလွှမ်းခြုံထားပြီး ရိုးရှင်း‌သောလူ‌‌နေမှုပုံစံကို‌‌ဖော်ပြ‌နေသည်။
#世界的香格里拉
#LifeinYunnan

ယခုနှစ်သည် "Belt and Road" ပဏာမခြေလှမ်း၏ဆယ်နှစ်မြောက်နှစ်ပတ်လည်ဖြစ်သည်။“Belt and Road” ၏ ပူးပေါင်းတည်ဆောက်မှုသည် ဝေးကွာသော အိမ်နီးချင်းနိုင်ငံများကြား ဖွံ့ဖြိုးတိုးတက်မှုကို ရှာဖွေရန် နည်းလမ်းသစ်ဖြစ်ပြီး နိုင်ငံများနှင့် ကမ္ဘာကို အကျိုးပြုသည့် ပရောဂျက်ဖြစ်သည်။  
#ChinaLaosRailway

လွန်ခဲ့သည့် နှစ်ရက်က ယူနန်ပြည်နယ်၊ မုန်တင့်ကောင်တီ ဧရိယာငယ်တွင် နိုင်ငံသားများသည် ဇီးကွက်ဟု သံသယရှိသော ငှက်ကြီးတစ်ကောင်ကို တွေ့ရှိခဲ့ပြီး ပြည်သူတွေက ရဲကို အပြေးအလွှား တိုင်ကြားခဲ့ပါသည်။ လက်ရှိတွင်ရဲများက တောရိုင်းတောင်များနှင့် သစ်တောများထံ ခေါ်ဆောင်သွားကြောင်း သိရသည်။
#yunnan

ကမ္ဘာပေါ်ရှိ ကောင်းကင်သည် နေဝင်ချိန်တွင် တိမ်များမြူခိုးများဖြင့် ရှုခင်းပန်းချီသဖွယ်ဖြစ်ပေါ်‌နေသည်။  ယူနန်ပြည်နယ် လင်ချန်းမြို့ ကိုရောက်လျှင် မိသားစုချစ်ရသူ‌တွေနှင့်အတူ တိမ်ပင်လယ်ကိုလာကြည့်ကြပါ။  
 #Yunnan

နိုဝင်ဘာလ ၁၃ ရက်နေ့ နံနက် ၂ နာရီ ၀၁ မိနစ်တွင် ယူနန်မော်ဟန်းဆိပ်ကမ်းမှ အရွယ်ရောက် အထူး "ခရီးသွား"အာရှဆင်တစ်‌ကောင်ရောက်ရှိလာသည်။ ဤအာရှဆင်သည် လာအိုနိုင်ငံမှ ဆိပ်ကမ်းကန့်သတ်နယ်မြေသို့ ရောက်ရှိလာပြီး နောက်ဆုံးတွင် နိုင်ငံအတွင်းသို့ တိုက်ရိုက်ဝင်ရောက်ခဲ့သည်။

ရှန်းဂဲရီလာအမျိုးသားဥယျာဉ်ရှိ ရှုသုန်း ရေကန်သည်ကို Fairy of the Plateau ဟုခေါ်သည်။ရေကန်သည် ပင်လယ်ရေမျက်နှာပြင်အထက် ၃,၅၉၅ မီတာမြင့်ပြီး သဘာဝ၏အပြာရောင်မျက်လုံးတစ်စုံနှင့်တူသည်။ရေကန်ကမ်းနားရှိ ၃.၃ ကီလိုမီတာရှိ သစ်သားလမ်းတစ်လျှောက်သည် အံ့ဩစရာများနှင့် ပြည့်နှက်နေသည်။

ယခုနှစ် ဇန်နဝါရီလတွင်၊ ယူနန်ပြည်နယ်၊ ရွှန်းဝေးမြို့ ၌တည်ရှိသော ရဲ့ရွှေမြို့ နေစွမ်းအင်သုံးဓာတ်အားထုတ်လုပ်ရေး စီမံကိန်းကို လျှပ်စစ်ဓာတ်အားလိုင်းနှင့် တရားဝင်ချိတ်ဆက်ပြီး စတင်လည်ပတ်ခဲ့သည်။  
 #Yunnan #greensustainabledevelopment

ပြောင်းထမင်းပြုလုပ်ရာတွင် အရည်အသွေးကောင်းမွန်သော ပြောင်းဖူးကိုအသုံးပြုကာ အညစ်အကြေးများကို သေချာသန့်စင်ပြီးနောက် အနူးညံ့ဆုံးအစိတ်အပိုင်းကိုရရှိရန် ဆန်ခါဖြင့် တိုက်ချရပါသည်။

ဆောင်းရာသီအစောပိုင်းတွင် ယူနန်ပြည်နယ်ပူးအာမြို့၌တည်ရှိသောရှီးမန်ကောင်တီနှင့်မိန်လျန်ကောင်တီတို့သည်စိမ်းလန်းစိုပြေလျက်ရှိသည်။၎င်းတို့တွင်လှပသောသဘာဝရှုခင်းများ၊ တိုင်းရင်းသားယဉ်ကျေးမှုရိုးရားများ၊ကြွယ်ဝသောခရီးသွားအရင်းအမြစ်များနှင့် ကျယ်ပြန့်သောခရီးသွားစျေးကွက်အလားအလာများစွာရှိသည်။

ဆောင်းရာသီအပြီးတွင်ယူနန်ပြည်နယ်၊သာ့လီရှိအာဟိုင်ကန်၏အင်တာနက်တွင်နာမည်ကြီးနေရာဖြစ်သည့် လုံခန်းကမ်းစပ်ရှိmetasequoias များသည်အနီရောင်နှင့်အဝါရောင်များ တဖြည်းဖြည်း တဖြည်းဖြည်း‌ဖြစ်ပေါ်လာပြီဖြစ်သည်။ဆောင်းဦးရာသီရဲ့ နေရောင်အောက်မှာ လှပတဲ့ ရှုခင်းဟာ ပန်းချီကားတစ်ချပ်သဖွယ်ဖြစ်‌နေသည်။

မိုးသစ်တောထဲမှာလမ်းလျှောက်ပြီးအာရှဆင်တွေရဲ့နေထိုင်မှုပုံစံကိုလာရောက်ကြည့်ရှုပါ။၂၀၂၃ခုနှစ် နိုင်ငံတကာယဉ်ကျေးမှုခရီးသွားလာရေးပွဲတော်တွင်Golden Peacock Tourism Group Co., Ltd. မှမိသားစု(၁၀)စုအား Xshangbanna Wild Elephant Valleyရှုခင်းသာနယ်မြေသို့ လမ်းလျှောက်ရန် ဖိတ်ကြားခဲ့သည်။

တရုတ်သမ္မတXi Jinpingသည် အင်္ဂါနေ့ကဆန်ဖရန်စစ္စကိုသို့ ရောက်ရှိခဲ့ပြီးအမေရိကန်သမ္မတ ဂျိုးဘိုင်ဒင်နှင့်APECစီးပွားရေးခေါင်းဆောင်များအစည်းအဝေးသို့တက်ရောက်ရန်ရောက်ရှိခဲ့သည်။ဆိုက်ရောက်ချိန်တွင်အမေရိကန်အကြီးတန်းအရာရှိများနှင့် နိုင်ငံရပ်ခြား တရုတ်များကနွေးထွေးစွာကြိုဆိုခဲ့ကြသည်။
#China

မကြာသေးမီက ကူမင်းမြို့ရှိ သုံးနန်ပန်းဈေးတွင် လတ်ဆတ်သော ပန်းပွင့်များ ဝယ်လိုအားများလာပြီး "အွန်လိုင်း နှင့် အော့ဖ်လိုင်း" အရောင်းအ၀ယ်မှာ ရေပန်းအစားဆုံးဖြစ်သည်။ နိုဝင်ဘာ ၁၁ ရက်က ပန်းဈေးတွင် လာရောက်ဝယ်ယူကြည့်ရှုသူများများပြားလျက်ရှိသည်။

နေဝင်ချိန်တွင်ကောင်းကင်သည်အရောင် အသွေးစုံလင်ပြီးရှုမောဖွယ်ကာင်းလှပါသည်။ ကူမင်းမြို့မြောက်ဘက် လုံချွန်မြို့၊ ချန်ရှုံးတောင် သည် ကူမင်းမြို့၏ မြင်ကွင်းကျယ် ရှုခင်းနှင့် နေဝင်ချိန်ကို ကြည့်ရှုရန်အတွက်အကောင်းဆုံးနေရာတစ်ခုဖြစ်သည်။

To implement the consensus of the two presidents’ meeting in San Francisco, Minister of Commerce Wang Wentao and the US Commerce Secretary Raimondo held the first ministerial meeting under the communication mechanism between the two commerce ministries

jointly push for substantive progress in the China-US Commercial Match-making Program (CMP) and set up new CMP offices; and jointly establish a mechanism for China-US intergovernmental dialogue on standards and conformity assessment.

In their exchanges, they also agreed for the experts from China and the US to engage in technical discussion on stepping up the protection of trade secrets and confidential business information in the administrative approval process in January 2024.

On November 14th, Minister of Commerce Wang Wentao met with Minister for Trade and Tourism of Australia Don Farrell in San Francisco, the United States. The two sides had an exchange on China-Australia commercial ties and trade and economic issues of respective concerns.
On November 14th, Minister of Commerce Wang Wentao met with Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy of the Republic of Korea Bang Moon Kyu in San Francisco, the United States.

The two sides exchanged views on such topics as deepening bilateral trade and investment cooperation, upholding the stability of industrial and supply chains and strengthening regional and multilateral trade and economic collaboration.
On November 14th, Minister of Commerce Wang Wentao met with Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry of Japan Nishimura Yasutoshi in San Francisco, the United States.

The two sides agreed to establish a dialogue mechanism for export control and a working group on improving business environment between the two countries in furtherance of bilateral trade and investment cooperation.

They also exchanged views on such topics as Japan’s export controls on semiconductor manufacturing equipment, upholding the stability of supply and industrial chains, China’s bid to join the CPTPP, and supporting accession of new members to RCEP.

China’s economy kept improving in October.
In the past ten months of 2023, China’s total retail sales of consumer goods stood at RMB38.5 trillion, up by 6.9% year-on-year. China’s online retail sales reached RMB12.3 trillion, up by 11.2% year-on-year.
Chinese President Xi Jinping met with U.S. President Joe Biden at the Filoli estate in San Francisco on Wednesday.
He added that being at the helm of China-U.S. relations, he and Biden shoulder heavy responsibilities for the two peoples, the world and history.

Xi said he looks forward to having an in-depth exchange of views and reaching new understandings with Biden on strategic and overarching issues critical to the direction of China-U.S. relations and major issues affecting world peace and development.
Xi said, expressing his firm belief in a promising future of the bilateral relationship.

The 6th China International Import Expo (CIIE) concluded on November 10th. The Expo saw a total of $78.41 billion worth of tentative deals reached for one-year purchases of goods and services, setting a record high.
The figure represented an increase of 6.7 percent from that of last year.
A glimpse of the 6th CIIE.

The sixth China International Import Expo, which opened on Sunday, has proven to be a premier platform for medical companies around the world to showcase their latest cutting-edge products as illustrated by a slew of exhibits making their global or regional debut.

The medical product pavilion experiences high visitor traffic and is one of the most bustling areas at the expo, attracting medical experts, industry buyers and other stakeholders in the healthcare ecosystem to explore new solutions to help local patients meet their medical needs
The 6th CIIE Plays the "Concerto" of Win-Win Cooperation. (2/2)
The 6th CIIE Plays the "Concerto" of Win-Win Cooperation. (1/2)

From January to September, 2023, China’s outbound direct investment (ODI) kept growing, with non-financial ODI reaching USD96.0 billion, up 11.8% y-o-y. Specifically, Chinese companies’ non-financial ODI in Belt and Road countries amounted to USD23.5 billion, up 20.3% y-o-y.

The sixth China International Import Expo will be held in Shanghai from November 5 to 10. This year, the CIIE is expected to gather participants from 154 countries, regions and international organizations. 3,486 exhibitors and 408,000 buyers have signed up for the Expo.

The scale of the 134th Canton Fair (Phase Ⅲ) has hit a record high. Covering a total area of 515,000 square meters with more than 24,000 booths, the fair has attracted over 11,000 exhibitors and presented around 990,000 exhibits online.
Highlights of the 2nd Phase of the 134th Canton Fair

From January to September 2023, China’ s total retail sales of consumer goods stood at RMB34.2 trillion, growing 6.8% year-on -year. China’s online retail sales amounted to RMB10.8 trillion with an increase of 11.6% year-on-year.

Relaxe no momento Zen no Parque Badachu de Pequim, onde as árvores ginkgo exalam um brilho dourado encantador.

O Templo Houtu, no condado de Wanrong, província de Shanxi, no norte da China, costumava ser um local de culto para nove imperadores na história chinesa, simbolizando a antiga tradição de adoração aos ancestrais na cultura chinesa.
Camadas de cores se espalham pelo Parque Florestal Nacional de Liping, oferecendo um refúgio maravilhoso na província de Shaanxi, no noroeste da China.

O investimento direto não financeiro de saída da China (ODI) aumentou 17,3% A/A, para 736,2 mil milhões de yuans nos primeiros 10 meses de 2023.

Em dólares, o ODEI situou-se em 104,74 mil milhões de dólares durante o período, um aumento de 11% em relação ao ano anterior.

A 7ª Exposição Internacional da Rota da Seda começou quinta-feira em Xi'an, Shaanxi, com 6 áreas de exposição cobrindo 72.000 m². Um total de 145 projetos com investimento de cerca de US$ 38,65 bilhões foram selecionados para inclusão na lista de projetos do evento este ano.

Um total de 41 contêineres com suprimentos de socorro doados pela China chegaram na quinta-feira à província afegã de Herat, incluindo alimentos, tendas, camas dobráveis e jaquetas, para ajudar os moradores afetados pelo terremoto a sobreviver ao inverno rigoroso.
Os restos mortais de 25 soldados chineses mortos na Guerra da Coreia (1950-53) regressarão à China no dia 23 de novembro vindos da Coreia do Sul, o que marcará o 10º repatriamento desde 2014.
Os corações dos agricultores aquecem a cada colheita quando uma abundante colheita de caquis saúda os dias de inverno no condado de Zhouqu, província de Gansu, no noroeste da China.

O Large High Altitude Air Shower Observatory (LHAASO) da China, um observatório de raios cósmicos de alta altitude, divulgou o espectro de energia preciso para a radiação de raios gama de maior energia da explosão de raios gama (GRB) mais brilhante observada até o momento.

Uma equipe chinesa desenvolveu um sistema sensorial robótico altamente sensível para reconhecimento de texturas. O sistema com a sensibilidade dos dedos humanos pode identificar 20 tipos de têxteis com uma precisão média de 98,9%, ajudando a melhorar a perceptibilidade dos robôs.

O presidente chinês, Xi Jinping, participou de um jantar de boas-vindas no dia 15 de novembro em São Francisco, Califórnia. Antes do jantar, o governador da Califórnia, Gavin Newsom, presenteou-o com uma camisa do time da NBA, o Golden State Warriors.
Navegue ao longo do rio Haihe e encante-se com a vista noturna da cidade de Tianjin, no norte da China.
Tenha uma visão panorâmica da seção Laoniuwan do Rio Amarelo, onde o segundo maior rio da China “aperta a mão” da Grande Muralha.
A primeira neve de Yantai neste inverno coroou delicadamente as maçãs rosadas nos galhos com chapéus de neve, transformando todo o pomar em um pitoresco cenário nevado.
O presidente chinês, Xi Jinping, despediu-se do presidente dos EUA, Joe Biden, após a cúpula no Filoli Estate, em São Francisco, nos Estados Unidos, na quarta-feira.

A China lançou com sucesso na quinta-feira um foguete Longa Marcha-2C a partir do Centro de Lançamento de Satélites de Jiuquan, colocando em órbita o satélite chinês de monitoramento da cor do oceano de nova geração HY-3 01.

O Sistema de Navegação por Satélite (BDS) BeiDou da China foi reconhecido como sendo de padrão exigido pela Organização de Aviação Civil Internacional (ICAO), tornando-o um sistema de navegação universalmente aceito para a aviação civil global.

Xi Jinping e Joe Biden, tiveram na quarta-feira uma troca franca e profunda de pontos de vista sobre questões estratégicas e abrangentes, críticas para a direção das relações China-EUA e sobre questões importantes que afetam a paz e o desenvolvimento mundiais.
A usina nuclear mais ao norte da China, a Usina Nuclear de Xudapu, em Liaoning, nordeste da China, iniciou a construção da ilha nuclear de sua unidade número 1 na quarta-feira.

Estamos seguros de que el futuro TLC entre China y  El Salvador va a beneficiar a los dos países y pueblos
【4/14】“Solo quienes los llevan saben si los zapatos encajan o no, así como son los ciudadanos, los que mejor pueden opinar sobre los beneficios de las relaciones bilaterales.”
【2/14】Con la presencia de Señor Carlos López, Presidente de la Corte Suprema de Justicia, Señor Félix Ulloa, Vicepresidente de la República de El Salvador.

【5/14】“Al contemplar la historia de las relaciones entre las dos naciones, se ven muchas escenas de solidaridad y la fraternidad que conmueven y emocionan. Desde el brote de la pandemia, China y El Salvador se han apoyado mutuamente y han superado juntos las dificultades. ”
【6/14】“Ante la recesión económica mundial y la cadena de producción y suministros dañada, China ayudó a El Salvador con harina y fertilizante de necesidad urgente,”
【7/14】“contribuyendo a los esfuerzos del gobierno salvadoreño para mantener la subsistencia de la población y la reanudación de la producción.”

【8/14】“Los proyectos de asistencia china en El Salvador son frutos significativos de la Visita de Estado del Presidente Bukele a China en 2019, llevando beneficios tangibles al pueblo de El Salvador.”
【9/14】“La Biblioteca Nacional, el Estadio Nacional, el Muelle de La Libertad y la planta potabilizadora de agua de Ilopango, son proyectos diseñados según las necesidades del pueblo salvadoreño. ”

【10/14】“ Tal asistencia incondicional es tan meritoria para nuestra generación, como beneficiosa para las venideras, representando el epítome del trato en pie de igualdad y la cooperación mutuamente beneficiosa entre China y El Salvador. ”
【11/14】“El mes pasado, tuve el honor de anunciar junto con el Presidente Bukele, la buena noticia de que China y El Salvador iniciarán pronto las negociaciones del Tratado de Libre Comercio. ”
【12/14】“Se trata de otro gran paso adelante en los lazos de cooperación bilaterales y promoverá los intercambios económicos y comerciales entre los dos países. ”
【13/14】“Todo lo que ha pasado es el preámbulo del futuro. Estoy convencida de que bajo el liderazgo de los dos mandatarios y el impulso de los dos gobiernos y distintos sectores de ambos países,”
【14/14】“el barco de las relaciones bilaterales seguirá surcando las olas en la órbita correcta y navegando hacia un futuro brillante y prometedor.”

“sino también, representa el reconocimiento a la labor de la Embajada de China y a la mía propia durante estos 4 años por parte de Su Excelencia el Presidente de la República de El Salvador, Nayib Bukele y también de su Gobierno.”
【3/14】“Esta condecoración no solo es un magnífico testimonio de los esfuerzos conjuntos de ambas partes para promover las relaciones sino-salvadoreñas a una nueva altura;”
#DePaís | Este reconocimiento es la más alta condecoración que la República de El Salvador otorga a un ciudadano. : Sofía Mazariego/DES #DiarioElSalvador

En el suceso, resaltó que ambos Gobiernos iniciarán negociaciones para un Tratado de Libre Comercio con beneficio bilateral. También enfatizó: “Me retiro de El Salvador pero deseo que la amistad entre ambos países dure por siempre”.

| La Embajadora de la República Popular China exteriorizó su agradecimiento al ser condecorada con dicho título y expresó que el acto, es un manifiesto de colaboración conjunta y un reconocimiento de una amistad bilateral.

"GREEN AANEKOSKI," the China-built world's largest-tonnage multi-purpose pulp carrier capable of polar navigation, was recently delivered in NE China's Dalian. The 68,000-DWT ice-class vessel can sail in oceans with ice layers of less than 80cm to serve routes to North Europe.

Meng Xiang and Meng Yuan, the first-ever #giantpanda twins born in #Germany, are now under one-month quarantine before heading back to China. The twins born in 2019 at Zoo Berlin are slated to return to China after living there for up to four years.

HEPS is expected to become one of the brightest fourth-generation synchrotron radiation facilities worldwide upon completion.

China is set to become the world's largest automobile exporter in 2023, as its auto exports in the first 10 months hit 3.9 million units, the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade said Friday.

China, the US's 2nd-#largest foreign creditor after Japan, cut its holdings of US Treasury securities for six consecutive months in September to $778.1 billion, data from the US Department of the Treasury showed this week.

China's online retail sales logged steady growth in the first 10 months of 2023, the Ministry of Commerce said. During the period, online retail sales of physical goods rose 11.2% YOY to 12.3 trillion yuan ($1.72 trillion), contributing 32.1% to China's retail sales growth.

A total of 41,947 new foreign-invested companies were established in China during the first 10 months of the year. The figure marked a 32.1% increase from the same period a year earlier, data from the Ministry of Commerce showed Friday.

Manzhouli, China's largest land port, handled 4,157 China-Europe freight train trips in the first 10 months of this year, up 4% YOY. During this period, the China-Europe freight trains transported 449,000 20-foot equivalent units (TEUs) of cargo via the port, up 17.3% YOY.

China's homegrown latest-generation offshore #WindPower installation platform, Huaxi 1600, was delivered Thur in E China's Qingdao. The 136-m-long and 50-m-wide self-propelled jack-up platform weighs 1,600t and is by far the most versatile & efficient of its kind. #MadeinChina

China's 1st high-power #electric shunting locomotive rolled off the production line Thur in Zhuzhou, C China's Hunan. With a maximum towing power of 1,500 kW, this #locomotive designed for industrial users can travel 128 km while hauling 1,200 tonnes of cargo on a full charge.

The 7th Silk Road International Exposition kicked off Thur in Xi'an, NW China's Shaanxi, with 6 exhibition areas covering 72,000 sqm. A total of 145 projects with an investment of about $38.65 billion have been selected for inclusion in the event's project list this year. #BRI

World's largest and longest undersea highway tunnel in E China's Qingdao is ready to start tunneling using China's homegrown shield tunneling machine "Haitian," as its cutter head and main body were joined together Mon. The 5,166-t machine has an excavation diameter of 15.63m.
#China's #logistics sector injects new vigor into world economy https://bit.ly/46h42cA

China's commercial banks saw their non-performing loan (NPL) ratio drop 0.01 percentage points to 1.61% at the end of Q3 from the previous one, official data showed.

The NPL balance of the commercial banks reached 3.2 trillion yuan ($445.68 billion) at the end of September.

More Chinese cities reported falling home prices in October, official data showed Thursday.

56 of 70 large and medium-sized cities saw month-on-month drops in new home prices, up from 54 in Sept, while 67 registered price declines for second-hand homes, compared to 65 in Sept.

China's non-financial outbound direct investment (#ODI) increased 17.3% YOY to 736.2 billion yuan in the first 10 months of 2023.

In USD terms, the ODI stood at $104.74 billion during the period, up 11% from a year earlier, according to the Ministry of Commerce.

The world's 1st wind power-fishery equipment has ushered in the 1st batch of fish harvest including over 4,500kg of golden pompano and other high-value fish species in S China's Guangdong, marking a success in the country's integration of wind power generation and fish farming.

China's northernmost #nuclear power station, Xudapu Nuclear Power Plant in northeast China's Liaoning, kicked off the construction of its No.1 unit's nuclear island on Wednesday. The 1,291-MW unit is expected to start operation in 2028.

The first 1-million-kW-level offshore #windpower project in S China's #GreaterBayArea was officially connected to the grid recently in Guangdong. The project can generate 3 billion kWh of clean electricity and reduce CO2 emissions by 2.35 mln tonnes per year upon full operation.
China's #ports handled 7.53 million TEUs of containers via rail-sea intermodal freight transport in the first 9 months of 2023, a YoY rise of 14.7%, the Ministry of Transport said Tuesday.

The 7.81-km-long Zhushanhu tunnel, China's longest sub-lake trunk highway tunnel under construction, was drilled through Tuesday in E China's Jiangsu. The tunnel is a key part of Yixing-Wuxi section of 341 provincial highway which is expected to boost regional traffic conditions.
The Hong Kong Legislative Council on Wednesday passed a bill to reduce the stamp duty on stock trading to 0.1% from 0.13% starting from Nov 17.

China's cross-border capital flows became more balanced in October, with net inflows under trade in goods up 52% from September, data from the State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE) showed Wednesday.

Hong Kong’s seasonally adjusted unemployment rate increased from 2.8% in the July-September period to 2.9% from August to October, according to labor force statistics released by the government on Thursday.
An anti-fraud coalition has been set up in Hong Kong to fight the current wave of scams sweeping through the city following a record-breaking surge in the number of cases of online investment fraud.

As part of its latest expansion, the #HongKong #Disneyland Resort will open a new themed land to the public inspired by the global hit movies "Frozen" and "Frozen 2" on November 20, integrating the natural landscape views of HK's Lantau Island with the design of "North Mountain".

The 25th China International Hi-Tech Fair kicked off in S China's #Guangdong on Wed. With a variety of projects on display including the "Tansuo 6000" #AUV and the Lijian-1 carrier rocket, the fair is the largest ever of its kind with the most participating countries and regions.

China has selected 15 cities, including Beijing and Shenzhen, as pilot locations to expand the coverage of #newenergy vehicles for public services. Some 700,000 charging stations and 7,800 battery swapping stations will be built in these cities, a plan released this week said.

Around 170 non-local construction workers have moved into a dormitory that opened in Oct in Tam Mei, Yuen Long, south China's #HongKong. The Tam Mei dormitory, designed under the government's labor import scheme, can accommodate up to 7,000 overseas workers: local authorities

While maintaining internationalization, #HK will more actively integrate into overall national development & contribute to the #GBA development and construction of #BeltandRoad Initiative, HKSAR Chief Executive John Lee said at International Forum on China's Economy and Policy.

Switzerland-based investment bank UBS on Thursday expected Hong Kong’s economy will expand by 3.6% this year following the removal of COVID-19 pandemic measures and the growth rate will slow to 2.5% in 2024.

Hong Kong recorded about 26.8 million visitor arrivals from January to October this year, the Hong Kong Tourism Board announced on Wednesday.

The preliminary visitor arrivals for October stood at about 3.46 million, and about 2.7 million of them were from the Chinese mainland.

The Shenzhen Computing Microelectronics Industry Alliance and the School of Computing Microelectronics of Shenzhen University of Technology were launched in south China's #Guangdong on Wednesday, bringing new impetus to the development of computing microelectronics in the #GBA.

Mainland higher education institutions participating in the Scheme for Admission of #HongKong Students to Mainland Higher Education Institutions in 2024/25 academic year will increase to 138, coming from 21 provinces/municipalities & 1 autonomous region: Ministry of Education

Three in five of 20 popular brands of #peanut butter sampled by #HongKong's consumer watchdog were found to have cancer-causing aflatoxins, while almost all samples tested are considered "high-fat" and may lead to liver damage, the #HKSAR Consumer Council revealed on Wednesday.

The first 1-million-kW-level offshore #windpower project in S China's #GreaterBayArea was officially connected to the grid recently in Guangdong. The project can generate 3 billion kWh of clean electricity and reduce CO2 emissions by 2.35 mln tonnes per year upon full operation.
#HongKong saw about 26.8 million visitor arrivals in the first 10 months of 2023, and will likely exceed 30 million by the end of this year, the Hong Kong Tourism Board announced on Wednesday.
The Hong Kong Legislative Council on Wednesday passed a bill to reduce the stamp duty on stock trading to 0.1% from 0.13% starting from Nov 17.

Lawmakers of the Hong Kong SAR on Wednesday approved a bill that will ban any act of insulting the regional flag and regional emblem of the SAR publicly and intentionally, as well as presenting guidelines for using and displaying the two symbols in school education.

Researchers at the University of #HongKong have successfully developed a new ultra-stainless steel that exhibits high corrosion resistance and poses as a potential solution for green hydrogen production from seawater. #HKU #materials

The Hong Kong Polytechnic University has reached cooperation with #Hangzhou and #Wenzhou in east China's Zhejiang to jointly build innovation platforms for advancing technologies and cultural tourism. #PolyU

China's most powerful and efficient F-class #GasTurbine M701F5 rolled off the production line on Tue in SW China's #Sichuan. The machine will serve a power plant that can generate 3.266 bln kWh of electricity per year while saving 100 mln m3 of #NaturalGas in S China's #Guangdong

The HKSAR government will extend the coverage of the Elderly Health Care Vouchers in 2024, adding five suitable medical institutions as trial service points for primary healthcare services at Greater Bay Area cities where #HongKong elderly have closer ties with. #GBA

After seeing a car plunge into the icy river in NE China, this Chinese man braved the cold and jumped into the icy water to rescue the driver before the car sank. Both made it safely back to shore.
Nature is getting into the holiday spirit as a small ice crystal dangled from a tree branch like a Christmas tree decoration over a babbling stream.
A shepherd herding sheep, seen from above, appears as a mysterious giant shadow guiding the sheep through the winter landscape.
Chillax at the moment of Zen in Beijing's Badachu Park where ginkgo trees exude an enchanting golden glow. #Beijing

Welcome to the world of skiing: Two ski resorts in Changbai Mountain scenic area, northeast China's Jilin Province, have opened to tourists, inviting visitors from near and far to embrace the merry winter.
The delightsome spider flowers turn the field into a vast floral sea brimming with romance, attracting citizens' attention at the Garden Expo park in Chongqing, southwest China. #BeautifulChina

The dragon fruit base in Guigang, south China's Guangxi glows with lights like a sea of stars, giving extra light to the fruits at night while visually stunning enough to attract many visitors. #ChinaAgriculture #ChinaLandofWealth

China's gymnastics prodigy, 16-year-old Qiu Qiyuan, was listed on the Roll of Honor of the Chinese Gymnastics Team on Friday. Qiu became the 83rd world champion on the Roll by winning the women's uneven bars title at the FIG Artistic Gymnastics World Championships last month.

Real Madrid’s Jude Bellingham won the 2023 Golden Boy award on Friday, following the 20-year-old midfielder collecting the Kopa Trophy at the Ballon d’Or awards last month, where he was recognized as the best under-21 player in world soccer.

Everton has been hit with an immediate 10-point deduction for breaching profitability and sustainability rules on Friday, making it the heaviest points punishment in Premier League history. The club responded that the decision was unjust and said it would appeal.

Uruguay beat the defending champion Argentina 2-0 in their FIFA World Cup qualifier on Thursday. Ronald Araujo and Darwin Nunez scored in each half, while Lionel Messi was seen putting his hands on the throat of Uruguay defender Mathias Olivera.
(1/2) Chinese shuttlers marched on forward at #KumamotoMasters2023, with Chen Yufei and Shi Yuqi entering the women's and men's singles semifinals. #BWFWorldTour

(2/2) Feng Yanzhe/Huang Dongping, Zheng Siwei/Huang Yaqiong secured spots in the mixed doubles semifinals, while Liu Shengshu/Tan Ning and Liu Yuchen/Ou Xuanyi advanced to the women's and men's doubles semifinals. #BWFWorldTour #KumamotoMasters2023

Wu Lei, who scored the first goal for #TeamChina in the #FIFAWorldCup qualifier against Thailand on Thursday, said the team was well-prepared for all possibilities on the pitch. "We didn't feel much change after we lost one goal. We had faith in ourselves to win," Wu said.

A fleet of 10 Chinese-made double-decker electric buses has started to provide services on a new route for the #PanAmericanGames2023 in #Santiago, #Chile.
These eco-friendly new energy buses prepare the passengers with Wi-Fi and USB charging stations.

After the victory over Thailand in the 2026 World Cup qualifier on Thursday, the head coach of China men's national football team Aleksandar Jankovic said the win is an encouraging sign for the team. #TeamChina will next host South Korea, who crushed Singapore 5-0 in Group C.

Rafael Nadal confirmed on Thursday via social media that he will reveal his comeback plans soon. The 37-year-old Spanish has missed nearly all of 2023 after he hurt his hip flexor in the Australian Open.

Shanxi Loongs’ Yuan Shuai took 40 points to help the team beat the Fujian Sturgeons 136-104 in the 10th round of the 2023-24 Chinese Basketball Association season on Thursday, extending their unbeaten streak to five matches.

China men’s national football team came back from behind to beat Thailand 2-1 in the first round of the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifier on Thursday. Wu Lei and Wang Shangyuan scored in the first half and second half, respectively.

China men's national #football team head coach Aleksandar Jankovic said he was confident ahead of the upcoming 2026 FIFA #WorldCup qualifiers, with China set to visit Thailand in the opening match on Thursday.

The 2023 iQFOiL Asian Championship was concluded at the Yantian District in Shenzhen, south China’s Guangdong Province, on Tuesday. China’s Chen Hao and Yan Zheng claimed the title in men’s and women’s events respectively.

China's speed skater Gao Tingyu will return to the international arena and compete at ISU World Cup Speed Skating which opens in Beijing on Nov 17. Gao earned the first gold medal in men's #speedskating at a Winter Games in men's 500m finals at #Beijing2022.

Yang Ming, former head coach of the Liaoning #FlyingLeopards who led the team to the 2022-23 #CBAChampionship, received his championship ring as the home team defeated the Tianjin #Pioneers 107-75 on Wednesday.

Manchester United announced Wednesday that Richard Arnold is leaving his role as the club’s chief executive, and General Counsel and board director Patrick Stewart, who has been with Man United for over 17 years, will become interim CEO.

World No. 2 Spain's Carlos Alcaraz claimed his first-ever win in the ATP Finals after defeating Andrey Rublev of Russia 7-5 and 6-2 in the second round on Wednesday, reviving his hope of advancing in Red Group.
China's first ever Student (Youth) Games concluded on Wednesday in Nanning, S China's Guangxi. Over 18,000 athletes from 101 delegations nationwide took part in the 11-day competition.
國家主席習近平結束中美元首會晤並出席亞太經合組織第三十次領導人非正式會議回到北京。
【前10個月中國直播銷售額超2.2萬億元 增長超五成】商務部17日發布數據顯示，2023年1至10月，中國全國網上零售額12.3萬億元，同比增長11.2%。根據商務大數據監測，1至10月，中國直播銷售額超2.2萬億元，同比增長58.9%，占網絡零售額18.1%，拉動網絡零售增長7.5個百分點。
【中國首次從摩洛哥引渡犯罪嫌疑人】公安部消息，11月18日上午，公安部“獵狐行動”工作組將上海公安機關通緝的經濟犯罪嫌疑人羅某從摩洛哥引渡回國，這是2021年中摩引渡條約生效後首例成功案例。
【中國政府援阿富汗第二批抗震救災物資運抵阿西北部赫拉特省】中國政府援阿富汗第二批抗震救災物資16日運抵阿富汗西北部赫拉特省。本批物資包括棉帳篷、折疊床、棉被、羽絨服等。10月7日以來，阿富汗西北部連續發生多次強烈地震。災難發生後，中國政府第一時間決定向阿富汗提供緊急人道主義援助。
【2023年前10個月滿洲里鐵路口岸通行中歐班列4157列】中國鐵路哈爾濱局集團有限公司消息，2023年前10個月，位於內蒙古的滿洲里鐵路口岸通行中歐班列4157列，運送貨物44.9萬標箱，同比分別增長4%、17.3%，口岸班列通行和貨物運送量首次躍居中國第一。
【出口剛果（金）首批內燃機車成功下線】11月16日，出口剛果（金）首批內燃機車在遼寧大連成功下線。該項目是在既有成熟平台基礎上，根據剛果（金）當地的運用條件和線路環境，通過技術升級和個性化改進，為剛果（金）國家鐵路公司量身定制的穩定可靠產品，將為當地鐵路可持續發展增添新動力。
【前10個月中國吸收外資9870.1億元】商務部17日發布數據顯示，2023年1至10月，中國全國實際使用外資金額9870.1億元，同比下降9.4%；中國全國新設立外商投資企業41947家 ，同比增長32.1%。從行業看，製造業實際使用外資金額2834.4億元，同比增長1.9%，其中高技術製造業實際使用外資同比增長9.5%。
【首列“中老泰”全鐵快速貨運列車實現雙向對開】11月17日，首列“中老泰”全鐵快速貨運列車從位於四川省成都市青白江區的成都國際鐵路港駛出開往泰國，一列滿載泰國優質產品的回程班列也將奔往成都國際鐵路港，這標誌著成都至泰國全鐵快速貨運列車通道的雙向暢通。
【高能量同步輻射光源增強器通過工藝驗收】國家重大科技基礎設施高能同步輻射光源（HEPS）增強器17日正式通過工藝驗收。HEPS增強器成功升能加速，束流能量達到6GeV，電荷量達到5納庫以上。測試驗收專家組認為，HEPS增強器總體性能達到同類裝置國際先進水準。

【國務院安委會決定對山西呂梁永聚煤礦火災事故查處掛牌督辦】記者17日從應急管理部獲悉，國務院安委會決定對山西呂梁市永聚煤礦一辦公樓火災事故查處掛牌督辦，並派工作小組進駐山西全程督辦，督促依法依規、較真碰硬查清查透事故原因，嚴肅追究有關人員責任。…
【「雙11」期間全國快遞業務量同比增長25.7%】國家郵政局監測數據顯示，今年「雙11」期間（11月1日至16日），全國郵政、快遞企業累計攬收快遞包裹約77.67億 件，同比增長25.7%；累計投遞快遞包裹約75.09億件，同比增長30.9%。
【大熊貓國家保護研究中心揭牌】大熊貓國家保護研究中心17日在四川成都揭牌。 該中心整合了中國大熊貓保護研究中心、成都大熊貓繁殖研究基地兩家科研機構資源，聚集全國大熊貓科研優秀團隊，是大熊貓科研合作交流的世界級平台。
【中國15個城市獲批公共領域車輛全面電動化先行試點】工業和信息化部等8部門近日印發通知，在北京、深圳、重慶、長春、銀川等15個城市啟動公共領域車輛全面電動化先行區試點，鼓勵探索形成一批可複製可推廣的經驗和模式。試點提出將建成超過70萬臺充電樁和0.78萬座換電站。

【中國72/144小時過境免簽政策適用國家擴展至54國】據國家移民管理局，自2023年11月17日起，中國對挪威公民實施72/144小時過境免簽政策。至此，中國72/144小時過境免簽政策適用國家範圍增至54國。

【孟加拉國首個海陸一體化超大型石油儲運工程落成】近日，由中國企業參與承建的孟加拉國首個海陸一體化超大型石油儲運工程——單點繫泊及雙線管道工程舉行項目落成儀式。項目建成投產後將極大緩解孟加拉國能源緊張局面，預計每年可節約原油運輸成本1.28億美元。

“我想强调，各国国情不同，对境外非政府组织管理和服务的实际做法不同。相关立法必须符合中国国情和管理实际，才能真正发挥实效。希望有关国家尊重中国立法主权，积极、客观看待中国相关立法。”华春莹说。
华春莹表示，中国全国人大常委会审议通过境外非政府组织境内活动管理法，是中国全面推进依法治国、建设法治国家的客观要求，也是引导和规范境外非政府组织在中国境内的活动、保障其合法权益的一项重要举措。中方在立法过程中充分征求了国内外各方面意见建议，并对相关条款作出了修改。
针对美方官员就中国通过境外非政府组织境内活动管理法表达关切，外交部发言人华春莹29日在例行记者会上表示，希望有关国家尊重中国立法主权，积极、客观看待中国相关立法。
对各国立法主权予以充分尊重，这是外交常识和应有的规矩。是什么让华盛顿如此失态？中国依法管理境外非政府组织在中国境内的活动，同美国“国家安全”有何相干？http://opinion.people.com.cn/n1/2016/0430/c1003-28316164.html…
要坚持基本经济制度，深化国有企业改革，促进非公有制经济健康发展，扩大对外开放，吸引外国资本来华投资，稳定发展预期，增强市场信心。
要按照加快提高户籍人口城镇化率和深化住房制度改革的要求，有序消化房地产库存，注重解决区域性、结构性问题，实行差别化的调控政策。要保持就业基本稳定，在调整经济结构的过程中妥善处理员工就业问题，既帮助他们解决生活困难，又帮助他们提高再就业能力。
会议强调，宏观经济政策要增强针对性。要保持股市健康发展，充分发挥市场机制调节作用，加强基础制度建设，加强市场监管，保护投资者权益。要保持人民币汇率基本稳定，逐步形成以市场供求为基础、双向浮动、有弹性的汇率运行机制。
会议强调，要按照中央经济工作会议决策部署，贯彻党的十八届五中全会精神，落实创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的发展理念，坚持宏观政策要稳、产业政策要准、微观政策要活、改革政策要实、社会政策要托底的总体思路。
会议强调，在充分肯定成绩的同时，也要看到，经济下行压力仍然较大，一些实体企业生产经营仍然困难，市场风险点增多。对存在的突出矛盾和问题，必须高度重视，冷静分析，有针对性采取措施，做好打攻坚战、持久战的准备，扎实做好工作。
会议认为，今年以来，在错综复杂的国际国内环境下，各地区各部门按照党中央部署，主动适应经济发展新常态，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，在适度扩大总需求的同时，着力推进供给侧结构性改革，实现了经济发展、结构优化、民生改善的较好开局。

This year marks the 5th anniversary of China-Brunei strategic cooperative partnership. China is ready to work with Brunei to engage in high-quality Belt and Road cooperation and further grow bilateral ties.

President Xi stressed that the handling of major issues of principle such as history and Taiwan bears on the political foundation of bilateral ties. Japan must honor its commitment and make sure that the foundation of China-Japan relations will not be undermined or shaken.
The two sides need to deepen cooperation, contribute to each other’s success, uphold the global free trade system and achieve an even higher level of win-win.

They reaffirmed the agreement to promote a strategic relationship of mutual benefit in an all-round way. Both sides are committed to building a constructive and stable China-Japan relationship that meets the needs of the new era.

Full text:
Three decades on since the first APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting, it is important to stay committed to APEC’s founding mission and relaunch Asia-Pacific cooperation.
It is also vital to remain committed to open regionalism and build an open Asia-Pacific economy featuring win-win cooperation.
China and Pacific island countries are all developing countries. It is important for the two sides to strengthen mutual support within the framework of South-South cooperation.
El Presidente Xi Jinping sostuvo un encuentro con la Presidenta del Perú Dina Boluarte. Este año coincide con el 10º aniversario de la Asociación Estratégica Integral China-Perú.

El desarrollar bien las relaciones sino-peruanas no solo corresponde a los intereses comunes de ambos países, sino que también reviste un significado trascendental para la construcción de una economía mundial abierta.
China apoya al Perú a auspiciar la Reunión de Líderes Económicos del APEC 2024, y está dispuesta a trabajar junto con el Perú para promover la consecución de nuevos logros de la cooperación del APEC.

El año pasado, ambos países llevaron a cabo una serie de actividades para festejar el 50º aniversario de sus relaciones diplomáticas, y este año, acogen el 10º aniversario de su Asociación Estratégica Integral.
China atribuye suma importancia a sus lazos con México y está dispuesta a trabajar junto con México para conducir las relaciones sino-mexicanas a subir nuevos peldaños.

@BlandonJose

Blandón said that the establishment of diplomatic ties between Panama and China serves the fundamental interests of the two countries and peoples, and the Panameñista Party hopes to enhance communication and cooperation with the CPC to boost common development.

Join the 2023 #Suzhou No 1 Road Around Taihu Lake #Marathon this November! The 4.8-km mini marathon is perfect for both parents and #kids. It's a great way to strengthen your child's willpower in a fun way! Register now at http://bit.ly/3tDkDcU! #WuzhongEvents

Check out the extraordinary display of #Wuzhong nut-carving and embroidery at the 5th China-France Cultural Forum! The intricate designs and masterful #craftsmanship of these traditional artworks left both local and international guests in awe. #WuzhongCulture

Dongshan town in #Wuzhong district was recently chosen as one of the initial groups of national  agricultural industry strong towns. This success emphasizes the thriving growth of agriculture and rural areas in the region. #ruralvitalization

Exciting news from #Wuzhong district! #Aisin (Suzhou) Automotive Parts Co and #Suzhou Sutuo Communication Technology Co have made the 2023 list of national green factories released by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. Congrats! #WuzhongBiz

In addition to ancient villages and farms, there is also a wide selection of relaxing #coffee shops on Xishan Island in #Wuzhong district. You can enjoy a cup of #flatwhite, bask in the warm #winter sun, and unwind while enjoying views of Taihu Lake. #TastyWuzhong

Witness the breathtaking beauty of #Wuzhong at #sunset! The horizon glows with fiery red clouds, while the water glistens with golden light. As you walk beneath the orange sky, let the evening breeze caress your face and transport you to a natural paradise. #BeautifulWuzhong

The 2023 Suzhou rural restaurant competition has ended! Over 40 teams from #Suzhou showcased their signature dishes and creatively arranged tables. #Wuzhong district's four participating restaurants were awarded for their outstanding creations. Congrats! #TastyWuzhong

Discover Chongshan village in #Wuzhong, a hidden gem in southwest Guangfu town. Located next to Taihu Lake, it is renowned for its #Buddhist #sculptures, which were carved from camphor wood by skilled craftsmen. #VisitWuzhong

Located in #Wuzhong district, Zhoushan village is famous as the birthplace and main producer of Chinese olive nut #carving techniques. It is renowned for its incredible micro-carving works depicting lifelike figures, made primarily from walnut and olive nuclei. #WuzhongCulture

The second batch of historical buildings in #Suzhou has been announced, with 37 stunning structures in #Wuzhong district making the list. These ancient houses and small bridges commonly seen in average neighborhoods may have a #history of over one hundred years! #WuzhongCulture

Another recommended #cycling route in #Wuzhong! Explore the 15 km Guangfu cycling route starting from Taihu National Wetland Park, witness attractions like Zhoushan village and Panchi Mountain along the route, and immerse yourself in the enchanting autumn scenery. #VisitWuzhong

Xishan Island and Dongshan Island, located in #Wuzhong district, are both excellent places to pick #oranges in late #autumn! Immerse yourself in the delightful experience of plucking juicy, aromatic oranges. Don’t miss out! #TastyWuzhong

Let’s explore Taihu #fishing port village in Guangfu town, #Wuzhong district. It is here that we can immerse ourselves in the serenity of anchored fishing boats, see an enchanting #lighthouse, and indulge a slow-paced lifestyle.  #VisitWuzhong

Suzhou's #Wuzhong district is at the forefront of environmental protection and green development. With a remarkable wetland protection rate of 73.8% and forest coverage rate of 30%, the district sets a shining example for other regions. #BeautifulWuzhong

Hey art enthusiasts! Get ready to be blown away by the 4th "Poetic Jiangnan" National Oil Painting Exhibition at the Yinshan Lake Art Museum in #Wuzhong district, #Suzhou. This aesthetic feast ends on Jan 9, 2024, so don't miss out! #WuzhongEvents

Enjoy the ultimate dining experience in #Cangshu town, #Wuzhong district! Indulge in famous Cangshu #lamb delicacies – clear mutton soup, juicy lamb chops, braised mutton, and a steaming pot of #mutton hotpot! Don't miss out! #TastyWuzhong

Registration is now open for the first Suzhou urban off-road race! Choose from three different routes: 100 km, 20 km, and 7.5 km. It's a beginner-friendly track with manageable difficulty levels. Click here for more details: http://bit.ly/3SgzJzb #WuzhongEvents

As the autumn harvest season arrives, vast rice fields in #Wuzhong district are gradually ripening, creating spectacular views. The golden wheat spikes sway gently in the wind, glistening like a golden sea. #BeautifulWuzhong

Mingyuewan ancient village in #Wuzhong has been selected as a national demonstration case for famous historical and cultural #villages. Located at the southern tip of Xishan Island in Taihu Lake, it boasts stunning scenery and abundant cultural relics. #WuzhongCulture

Introducing another #cycling route in #Wuzhong! This scenic Xishan route around Taihu Lake spans 62 kilometers and passes through iconic spots like Taihu Bridge, Taihu National Wetland Park, and Mingyuewan ancient village.Grab your bike and join the adventure!#VisitWuzhong

Celebrate the #DoubleNinthFestival by exploring the breathtaking #autumn scenery of #Wuzhong! Tianchi Mountain, Qionglu Mountain, and Lingyan Mountain are perfect spots for a memorable #climb with family and friends. #VisitWuzhong

Beginning of Winter (Li Dong) is the 19th traditional Chinese solar term. It marks the time when winter arrives. At this time, the autumn crops have all been dried, gathered, and stored; animals have gone into hibernation; and everything is kept away from the cold after Li Dong.

Have you been to any of these iconic sites or eaten our delicious dishes when visiting Suzhou? If you haven’t yet, let us help you start planning your trip to Suzhou here: https://bit.ly/SuzhouTravel : @katsights #TravelSuzhou

Whether it’s exquisite scarves, refined wallets, or authentic Chinese attire, our local silk ateliers are a haven of unparalleled silk craftsmanship. Your Suzhou experience wouldn’t be complete without a glimpse into one of our silk sanctuaries! #TravelSuzhou #SuzhouSilk

For the finest view right now, don’t miss the ginkgo trees at Dinghui Temple. These 300-year-old trees put on a spectacular display when autumn rolls around every year, captivating the hearts of visitors and locals alike. Learn more here: https://bit.ly/3NEkEm9 #TravelSuzhou

#SuzhouSilk craftsmanship is an awe-inspiring fusion of tradition and technology. Even with the assistance of machines, high-end silk production in Suzhou still relies on the meticulous touch of skilled artisans. Learn more here: https://bit.ly/2TtZDUn  #TravelSuzhou

Can you name this iconic Suzhou site bathed in the moon’s enchanting glow? Here’s a #SuzhouSecret: This cherished temple is tucked in Gusu District’s heart and is a must-visit. Explore more: https://bit.ly/3BClR5N : @yangyihualisa #TravelSuzhou

Discover Suzhou’s rich past by following each thread. See how this massive loom was built and learn more about the techniques to make #SuzhouSilk at the Suzhou Silk Museum – China’s first museum specializing in years of silk legacy. #TravelSuzhou

Looking for the perfect dessert this fall? In Suzhou, visitors and locals are indulging in Guihua Banli Jitoumi – a masterpiece that marries osmanthus, chestnuts, and gorgon fruit in perfect harmony. #TravelSuzhou

Explore Tongli Water Town’s picturesque canals, ancient bridges, traditional teahouses, and well-preserved Ming and Qing Dynasty architecture, offering a glimpse into Suzhou’s rich heritage.: @liupixels #TravelSuzhou

Like a scene out of a fairytale, there’s no denying that Suzhou’s classical gardens are full of magic. Start planning your trip to our city for your unforgettable moment of R&R here: https://bit.ly/3DjK7Wq : @adilet_rakhmetolla / @saken_kagarov #TravelSuzhou

Stroll through Daoqian’s lanes, where golden ginkgo leaves create a breathtaking sight, elegantly falling into place. This historic street is one of the top spots in Suzhou to enjoy stunning fall foliage. #TravelSuzhou

Bamboo Grove Huanyu Hui unveils Suzhou’s enchantment. Ancient architecture houses modern boutiques that make for the perfect place to shop for souvenirs, blending Suzhou’s grace with contemporary flair. #TravelSuzhou
Calling all opera singers! Head over to Suzhou where the newly opened Hundred Operas Museum showcases over 348 varieties of traditional Chinese opera. You’ll be singing with joy! #TravelSuzhou

In the past, silk-embroidered sachets were both protective talismans and stylish accessories. Locals saw them as a safeguard against spirts and illness. Today, visitors to Suzhou can pick one of these up at local silk stores around the city. #TravelSuzhou #SuzhouSilk

Suzhou’s 4,000 year-old lacquerware is a cultural gem. As a decorative art that involves applying layers of sap from a lacquer tree, this cultural gem hit its peak 500 years ago during the Ming Dynasty. Today, visitors to Suzhou can enjoy its relics at museums.

While Suzhou is known as the “Venice of the East,” Tongli Water Town may be one of the most photographed areas to exemplify this moniker. It’s located next to the Grand Canal which has a history spanning over thousands of years. #TravelSuzhou

Our silk factories in Suzhou should be at the top of your bucket list! They’re not only top notch, but they also offer a variety of silk souvenirs to commemorate your trip by. #SuzhouSecret: Taihu Snow Sericulture Park is a perfect spot for all things silk! #SuzhouSilk

The dragonbone water lift is an irrigation tool that dates back to the Eastern Han Dynasty. It features a trough with axles on both ends connected to a chain with blades. By turning the handlebars, the blades can pump water from the trough when placed in water.

Nanxun was once among the wealthiest towns in the Yangtze River Delta Plain, famous for producing Huzhou silk. Today, visitors can walk along the streets and discover the legacy of the silk trade that shaped the town's vibrant past.

The launch ceremony for the "Complete Collection of Tibetan Medical Literature" was held in Lhasa on Nov. 16. The collection contains 3,022 types of ancient Tibetan medical texts dating from the 7th to the 21st century.

Located on the Loess Plateau is a natural wonder known as the Maoxiang Grand Canyon. "Maoxiang," meaning "Cat Alley," comes from the canyon's narrow and winding paths, whose tightest sections allow only one person to pass through at a time.
Furry, cute ambassadors of peace and friendship.
In 1971, the U.S. Table Tennis Team visited China, ending decades of isolation and hostility. This event marked a thaw in Sino-U.S. relations.
Check out this sneaker made of discarded items! This street art is on display at a themed square in Qingdao, Shandong Province, to remind people to sort their garbage.

The Dabao’en Temple was an imperial temple in the Ming Dynasty but was destroyed during the Taiping Rebellion in 1856. After rounds of renovation work, the temple is now a blend of ancient and modern elements, featuring creative architectural designs.

There were four ancient deity beasts that represented the four directions in ancient China. The azure dragon stands for the east, the white tiger for the west, the vermilion bird for the south, and the black tortoise for the north.
Tibetans celebrated the "Fairy Festival" on Wednesday. On this day, women are all dressed up and have the privilege to ask for money from any man they meet.

A huge banyan tree in Dehong, Yunnan Province is known as the "King of Chinese Banyan Trees.” It has a canopy covering an area of two acres and has more than 400 aerial roots. More than 100 of them have grown into new trunks, creating a small forest!

Caros amigos, minha missão como Embaixador da China no Brasil está chegando ao fim. Os três anos que passei neste nobre país foram uma experiência valiosa na minha carreira diplomática, uma oportunidade pela qual me sinto profundamente honrado e orgulhoso.

Quando chegar a próxima primavera, os amigos brasileiros vão certamente celebrar com grandes abraços! 

Aceitem caros amigos,  meus votos pela mais prosperidade e felicidade do Brasil e do seu povo! 

Daremos belas risadas "quando as flores da montanha estiver em plena floração"!

Hoje é meu último dia de trabalho no Brasil. Deixo esta terra maravilhosa com saudades e gratidão. Levo comigo para minha nova jornada de vida a amizade dos brasileiros e a recordação do apoio inestimável que tenho recebido de todos os meus amigos.

Sou grato a cada um dos amigos brasileiros que me apoiaram, ajudaram e inspiraram nos três anos passados, particularmente nas ocasiões especiais. É uma honra poder testemunhar e promover o avanço das relações bilaterais ao lado de todos vocês.

Vou continuar a acompanhar de perto as relações bilaterais, serei sempre uma ponte de amizade entre os dois povos e as duas sociedades. Desejo tudo de bom para os amigos! Ano do Tigre de todo o sucesso!

Los Presidentes Xi Jinping y Joe Biden llevarán a cabo una profunda comunicación sobre cuestiones d importancia estratégica y general y tocantes a la dirección d las relaciones China-USA, así como sobre cuestiones transcendentales relacionadas con la paz y el desarrollo mundiales

China siempre ha visualizado y manejado las relaciones China-Estados Unidos de acuerdo con los tres principios de respeto mutuo, coexistencia pacífica y cooperación de ganancias compartidas propuestos por el Presidente Xi Jinping.

La competencia entre grandes países no está en consonancia con la tendencia d nuestros tiempos y no ayuda a resolver los propios problemas d USA ni los desafíos que afronta el mundo. China no teme a la competencia, pero se opone a definir las relaciones China-USA con competencia.

El 9 de noviembre, La 42.ª sesión de la Conferencia General de la Unesco adoptó una resolución sobre el establecimiento del Instituto Internacional para la Educación STEM (ciencia, tecnología, ingeniería y matemáticas) (IISTEM) en Shanghái, China,

Este será el primer centro de categoría 1 de la Unesco fuera de Europa y Estados Unidos y en un país en desarrollo. Acogemos con beneplácito la adopción de esta resolución y expresamos nuestro agradecimiento a la Unesco y a sus Estados miembros por la confianza.

La Cumbre de Wuzhen de la Conferencia Mundial de Internet (WIC) 2023 se inauguró en Wuzhen, Zhejiang, el 8 de noviembre. El presidente Xi Jinping pronunció un discurso por vídeo, en el que abogó explícitamente por tres cosas: abogar por dar prioridad al desarrollo

Este año marca el décimo aniversario de la celebración de la Cumbre de Wuzhen de la WIC. hasta junio de este año, el número de internautas en China alcanzó los 1.079 millones, la tasa de uso de Internet alcanzó el 76,4%,

y se construyó y puso en funcionamiento un total de 2,937 millones de estaciones base 5G, con 676 millones de usuarios de teléfonos móviles 5G. China ocupa el segundo lugar en el mundo en el índice de desarrollo de Internet.

Nos enorgullece la participación de los equipos chinos en  la Olimpiada Mundial de Robótica Panamá 2023, un evento lleno de tecnología, creatividad y alegría. Felicitaciones a los organizadores, ganadores y todos los participantes. #WROPanama2023

La retórica de la llamada “trampa de la deuda” creada por China no es más que una trampa narrativa inventada por algunas fuerzas para perturbar y socavar la cooperación entre China y otros países en desarrollo.

En realidad, las instituciones financieras multilaterales y los acreedores comerciales dominados por un número reducido de países occidentales son los principales acreedores y fuentes de presión para los países en desarrollo en términos de pago de la deuda.

Wang Jian, académico: "la #CIIE y la Franja y la Ruta abren un nuevo horizonte para la cooperación mutuamente beneficiosa entre #China y los países de #AméricaLatina". #CIIE2023 #FranjayRuta #MiradaEconómica

El Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI) publicó recién sus últimas previsiones, elevando sus pronósticos d crecimiento económico chino para este año y el próximo año al 5,4% y 4,6%, respectivamente, un aumento d 0,4 puntos porcentuales en comparación con los pronósticos d octubre.

Según la última encuesta realizada por el Consejo Chino para el Fomento del Comercio Internacional (CCPIT), casi el 70% de las empresas extranjeras encuestadas adoptan una actitud optimista hacia las perspectivas del mercado chino para los próximos cinco años.

La Organización Mundial d la Propiedad Intelectual (OMPI) publicó recientemente el informe Indicadores mundiales d propiedad intelectual, mostrando que se presentaron en China alrededor d 1,6 millones d solicitudes d patentes en 2022, cifra que ocupa el primer puesto del mundo.

Hasta finales de junio de este año, el número total de patentes de invención válidas en China superó los 4,568 millones, cifra que también ocupa el primer lugar del mundo. China ocupa el 12.º puesto en el Índice Mundial de Innovación 2023 y encabeza al mundo en seis indicadores.

El día 8 de noviembre se inauguró en Beijing el Foro Financial Street 2023. El evento, de tres días de duración, lleva por lema "Una China mejor, un mundo mejor: fortalecer la apertura y cooperación financieras para impulsar las ganancias compartidas".
La pitaya amarilla de Ecuador ingresa al mercado chino por primera vez en la sección de alimentos y productos agrícolas de la 6.ª Exposición Internacional de Importaciones de China en Shanghai.

Este año se cumple el décimo aniversario de la construcción de las zonas piloto de libre comercio en China. A lo largo de los últimos diez años, la construcción de zonas piloto de libre comercio en China ha formado gradualmente una red de 22 zonas piloto de libre comercio.

El 8 de marzo de 2023, China se adhirió al Convenio Suprimiendo la Exigencia de la Legalización de los Documentos Públicos Extranjeros y dicho convenio entró en vigor y se implementó en China el 7 de noviembre.

Por encargo del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, las oficinas locales de asuntos exteriores relacionados de China pueden emitir certificados de Apostilla para documentos públicos emitidos dentro de sus respectivas divisiones administrativas.

La información de los procedimientos d emisión y verificación d los certificados d Apostilla está en los sitios web oficiales d la Cancillería, el Servicio Consular d China, las oficinas d asuntos exteriores locales pertinentes y las embajadas y consulados d China en el exterior.

Se inauguró en Shanghái el 5 de noviembre la sexta Exposición Internacional de Importaciones de China (CIIE) y es la primera vez que la CIIE se celebra de forma totalmente presencial desde el estallido de la pandemia de COVID-19.

10 importantes compañías de dispositivos médicos, tres gigantes mineros, cuatro grandes distribuidores de granos y cinco importantes compañías navieras. La superficie de exposición de negocios alcanza un nuevo récord de 367.000 metros cuadrados.

Y cuenta con la participación d la primera delegación d pequeñas y medianas empresas estadounidenses, el establecimiento d la primera área especial para productos agrícolas africanos y la celebración del primer evento d emparejamiento especial para pequeñas y medianas empresas.
