每年冬季，大量候鸟从青藏高原等地迁徙至贵州草海国家级自然保护区越冬。近日，在毗邻贵州草海国家级自然保护区的锁黄仓国家湿地公园，一群黑颈鹤正沐浴着阳光，或悠然散步，或展翅翱翔。

新疆天山：雪后美景 巍峨壮美

初冬时节，新疆昌吉回族自治州玛纳斯县南部山区降下初雪。在海拔2200米的翠云谷景区，苍翠的树木在白雪的覆盖下若隐若现。薄雾笼罩着山脊，雪山时而清晰，时而朦胧，一片银装素裹。天如碧海，云似轻舟，巍峨壮美，犹如仙境。

一只国家二级重点保护野生动物“晕倒”在边检站后获救

近日，云南省德宏州芒市的民警发现一只撞到玻璃后“晕倒”的老鹰。经查，该物种为凤头鹰，别名凤头苍鹰，属国家二级重点保护野生动物。在有关部门指导下，民警为凤头鹰认真检查身体情况，并对其进行喂食，确认符合放归条件后将其放回大自然。

旅德大熊猫双胞胎“梦想”“梦圆”要回家了！

第一对在德国出生的大熊猫双胞胎兄弟“梦想”和“梦圆”本周起进入一个月的隔离期，为回国做最后的准备。
根据柏林动物园与中国野生动物保护协会签署的大熊猫保护研究合作协议，“梦想”和“梦圆”在柏林生活至多四年后返回中国。

合掌岩云海氛围感拉满，宛若人间仙境！

福建省南平市顺昌县近郊的合掌岩是拍摄云海、日出的好地方。初冬时节，当冷暖空气在山脉上方交汇，顺昌合掌岩烟波浩渺的云海就此产生。登高俯瞰，大雾逐渐浓缩成白云悬在半山腰，宛若人间仙境，正所谓“碧峰峦间云雾浓，青山隐现如仙宫”。
位于北京使馆区的三里屯东五街一直被人称为“银杏大道”，每到十一月，路两旁金黄色的银杏树让整条街变得暖意融融。这里毗邻繁华的三里屯步行街和闲适的亮马河畔，路人在这一带漫步时可以同时体验到时尚、诗意和悠闲的北京街景。

L’ancienne rue Qinghefang est une rue piétonne à l’architecture traditonnelle chinoise. Dans le passé, cette rue était l’endroit le plus prospère de Hangzhou. Bien que réaménagée, elle conserve toute son ambiance et son charme.
#Hangzhou #AsianGames #tourisme #voyage

Hangzhou est l'une des anciennes capitales chinoises. Elle possède plusieurs quartiers historiques et culturels. Le quartier historique de « ruelle Wuliu 五柳巷 » est l'un d'entre eux. Peu touristique, ce quartier est l'endroit parfait pour découvrir la vie des habitants locaux.

La Chine compte de nombreux villages magnifiques et des cultures ethniques variées. L’émission « La vie entre eau et montagne » vous invite à visiter 5 villages pittoresques pour découvrir des expériences de vie diverses et des attractions culturelles captivantes.

Le village de Xidi n'est pas seulement célèbre pour ses paysages, mais aussi pour ses spécialités culinaires, notamment les "trois plats malodorants" : tofu poilu, tofu puant et perche puante. Ces plats, à l'odeur très forte, sont délicieux. 
#TheBond #campagne #village

Afin de mieux protéger les anciens bâtiments en bois, le village de Xidi conserve sa tradition de "veille nocturne". Parcourant les rues, on frappe un gong avec une baguette pour rappeler aux villageois de faire attention au feu et à l'électricité. #TheBond #Chine #campagne

La cuisine du Sichuan est très connue pour son goût pimenté. L’âme de cette cuisine réside dans la sauce aux fèves, qu’on appelle en chinois « 豆瓣酱dòu bàn jiàng ».

变脸 (biàn liǎn), littéralement le « visage changeant », est un art vivant lié à l’opéra du Sichuan. Durant le spectacle, l’artiste change de masques de manière si rapide que la transition est imperceptible pour les spectateurs.

As of today, Norway is added to countries enjoying China's 72/144 hr visa-free layover policy, which means Norwegian nationals passing through 23 Chinese cities may stay for 72/144 hrs without a visa.

The cities are Changsha, Harbin, Guilin (72hrs) and Beijing, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang, Qinhuangdao, Shanghai, Nanjing, Hangzhou, Ningbo, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Jieyang, Shenyang, Dalian, Qingdao, Chongqing, Chengdu, Xi'an, Wuhan and Kunming (144hrs)/2

A total of 54 countries now enjoy this policy. It's worth noting that the treatment is unilateral for many of the countries. All of the 8 hold graduate degrees, and 3 hold PhDs.

I’ve just concluded a day of meetings with President Xi, and I believe they were some of the most constructive and productive discussions we’ve had.

We built on groundwork laid over the past several months of diplomacy between our countries and made important progress.

President Xi Jinping: The foundation of China-U.S. relations was laid by our peoples. The door of China-U.S. relations was opened by our peoples.The stories of China-U.S. relations are written by our peoples. The future of China-U.S. relations will be created by our peoples.
“How to steer the giant ship of China-U.S. relations clear of hidden rocks and shoals? The number one question is: are we adversaries, or partners? This is the fundamental and overarching issue.”

President Biden reaffirmed 5 commitments he made in Bali: the U.S. does not seek a new Cold War, does not seek to change China’s system, does not seek to revitalize its alliances against China, does not support "Taiwan independence", has no intention to have a conflict with China

President Xi Jinping pointed out that mutual respect, peaceful coexistence and win-win cooperation are the lessons learned from 50 years of China-U.S. relations as well as the conflicts between major countries in history.

President Xi Jinping: China will not take the old path of colonization & plundering, or seeking hegemony with growing strength. It does not export its ideology. It has no plan to surpass or unseat the U.S..  Likewise, the U.S. should not scheme to suppress & contain China.

President Xi Jinping: For China and the U.S., turning their back on each other is not an option. It is unrealistic for one side to remodel the other. And conflict and confrontation has unbearable consequences for both sides.  The world is big enough to accommodate both countries.

There was a film about this called Sour Grapes which used to be streaming on Netflix (maybe still is). The most hilarious moment is when a bunch of rich Hollywood jerks, who believe they are real connoisseurs with a fine palette, learn the wine they are drinking is fake.

This is Rudy Kurniawan. Some years ago he grew famous as a wine merchant, buying and selling expensive, rare wines. But he was faking it. He was mixing cheap California wine and passing it off as 1960 French Bordeaux and the like. He was jailed for 10 years and then deported to…
and he was apparently mincing his words.
